[Kenneth Research] 調査期間: 2022年11月20日ー11月28日
調査業者: RNPL

entry.title: Deploying CSS Logical Properties On Web Apps
entry.summary: You may have already heard of CSS logical properties or RTL adaptations but are still deciding whether to deploy them widely. To help raise your awareness of their possibilities, Nicolas Hoffmann shares his experience of how he and his team at Proton carried out a massive move from CSS logical props to production and how you can consider them from a different perspective in your very own projects.

entry.title: How to Generate a Random Number within Certain a Range in JavaScript
entry.summary: Let's say you want to generate a random number between 10 and 15 – how do you do that in JavaScript? I'll show you how with examples in this article. In JavaScript, there's the random method of the Math object which returns random numbers. But this has a range limitation.
